zh_desc.flavor_text:
背上的种子里储存着营养，
所以即使好几天不吃东西
也可以活得好好的！

en_desc.flavor_text:
There is a plant seed on its back right
from the day this POKéMON is born.
The seed slowly grows larger.

zh_desc.flavor_text:
它的花苞会在吸收养分后
长大。当花苞发出香味时，
就预示着它快要开花了。

en_desc.flavor_text:
There is a plant bulb on its back.
When it absorbs nutrients, the bulb is said
to blossom into a large flower.

zh_desc.flavor_text:
它背上开出的大花
能够吸收太阳光
并将其转换为能量。

en_desc.flavor_text:
A bewitching aroma wafts from its flower.
The fragrance becalms those engaged in
a battle.

zh_desc.flavor_text:
要是把它带到安静的地方，
就能听到它的尾巴燃烧时
发出的微小的声音。

en_desc.flavor_text:
From the time it is born, a flame burns
at the tip of its tail. Its life would end
if the flame were to go out.

zh_desc.flavor_text:
在与强敌战斗的过程中，
如果情绪变得兴奋起来，
有时会喷出青白色的烈火。

en_desc.flavor_text:
It lashes about with its tail to knock
down its foe. It then tears up the fallen
opponent with sharp claws.

zh_desc.flavor_text:
从口中喷出灼热的火焰时，
尾巴尖端的红色火焰
会燃烧得更加猛烈。

en_desc.flavor_text:
Its wings can carry this POKéMON close to
an altitude of 4,600 feet. It blows out
fire at very high temperatures.

zh_desc.flavor_text:
通过从水面喷水来捕食。
在危急时刻会将四肢
缩入龟壳里保护自己。

en_desc.flavor_text:
When it retracts its long neck into its
shell, it squirts out water with vigorous
force.

zh_desc.flavor_text:
如果拍打它的头部，它会
把头缩进壳里，但尾巴
还是会露出来一点点。

en_desc.flavor_text:
This POKéMON is very popular as a pet.
Its fur-covered tail is a symbol of its
longevity.

zh_desc.flavor_text:
一旦锁定了目标，
它会以超越了消防
水枪的力道来喷水。

en_desc.flavor_text:
It crushes its foe under its heavy body
to cause fainting. In a pinch, it will
withdraw inside its shell.

zh_desc.flavor_text:
被鸟宝可梦袭击时
会从触角中释放出臭气抵抗，
但也经常会成为鸟食。

en_desc.flavor_text:
CATERPIE has a voracious appetite.
It can devour leaves bigger than its
body right before your eyes. From its antenna, this POKéMON releases
a terrifically strong odor.

zh_desc.flavor_text:
壳中藏着软乎乎的身体。
几乎不动是为了防止
身体一不留神就露出来。

en_desc.flavor_text:
Even though it is encased in a sturdy
shell, the body inside is tender.
It can’t withstand a harsh attack.

zh_desc.flavor_text:
仔细观察那对大眼睛的话，
会发现其实是许许多多小眼睛
聚集在一起形成的。

en_desc.flavor_text:
The wings are protected by rain-repellent
dust. As a result, this POKéMON can fly
about even in rain.

zh_desc.flavor_text:
头上长有尖锐的针。
它喜欢藏在森林或
草丛里大量吞食树叶。

en_desc.flavor_text:
Often found in forests and grasslands.
It has a sharp, toxic barb of around two
inches on top of its head.

zh_desc.flavor_text:
虽然几乎动也动不了，
但是如果遇到了危险，
有时似乎会竖起毒刺来反抗。

en_desc.flavor_text:
This POKéMON is in a temporary stage
while making its body. It is almost
completely unable to move on its own.

zh_desc.flavor_text:
它会用双手和
尾部的３根毒针
反复刺伤敌人。

en_desc.flavor_text:
A BEEDRILL is extremely territorial.
For safety reasons, no one should 
ever approach its nest. If angered,
they will attack in a swarm.

zh_desc.flavor_text:
性格沉着冷静，即使受到
攻击也很少反击，只会朝
对手扬起沙子保护自己。

en_desc.flavor_text:
Does not like to fight. It hides in
tall grass and so on, foraging for food
such as small bugs.

zh_desc.flavor_text:
拥有超群的体力，而且
飞翔范围广，经常飞到
很远的地方寻找食物。

en_desc.flavor_text:
The claws on its feet are well developed.
It can carry prey such as an EXEGGCUTE
to its nest over 60 miles away.

zh_desc.flavor_text:
以２马赫的飞行速度来
觅食。它巨大的爪子是
非常令人惧怕的武器。

en_desc.flavor_text:
It spreads its gorgeous wings widely to
intimidate enemies. It races through the
skies at Mach-2 speed.

zh_desc.flavor_text:
门牙会终生生长，所以必须要保养。
不准备好锉刀的话，会把柱子都啃掉。

en_desc.flavor_text:
A RATTATA is cautious in the extreme.
Even while it is asleep, it constantly
moves its ears and listens for danger.
It will make its nest anywhere.

zh_desc.flavor_text:
游泳很在行。后脚带有小小的蹼，
会渡过河流，有时还会渡过大海。

en_desc.flavor_text:
A RATICATE’s sturdy fangs grow steadily.
To keep them ground down, it gnaws on
rocks and logs. It may even chew on the
walls of houses.

zh_desc.flavor_text:
翅膀很短，飞行也不大在行。
忙忙碌碌地来回走动，
啄食草丛里的虫宝可梦。

en_desc.flavor_text:
Its loud cry can be heard over half a mile
away. If its high, keening cry is heard
echoing all around, it is a sign that they
are warning each other of danger.

zh_desc.flavor_text:
因为很强壮而持久力优秀。
即使载着很重的货物持续
飞行一整天也平心静气。

en_desc.flavor_text:
Its huge and magnificent wings can keep it
aloft in the sky. It can remain flying a
whole day without landing.

zh_desc.flavor_text:
甚至可以通过让颚脱位来
吞食比自己更大的猎物。
进食后就会蜷缩起身体进行休息。

en_desc.flavor_text:
A very common sight in grassland, etc.
It flicks its tongue in and out to sense
danger in its surroundings.

zh_desc.flavor_text:
根据最新的研究显示，
它们腹部的花纹有着
２０种以上不同的图案。

en_desc.flavor_text:
The pattern on its belly appears to be a
frightening face. Weak foes will flee just
at the sight of the pattern.

zh_desc.flavor_text:
最近发表了聚集大量皮卡丘，
建造发电厂的计划。

en_desc.flavor_text:
It has small electric sacs on both its
cheeks. If threatened, it looses electric
charges from the sacs.

zh_desc.flavor_text:
电击有时候会达到十万伏特，
不小心碰到的话，
连印度象也会昏厥。

en_desc.flavor_text:
If it stores too much electricity, its
behavior turns aggressive. To avoid this,
it occasionally discharges excess energy
and calms itself down.

zh_desc.flavor_text:
可以蜷缩身体变成球的样子。
骨碌碌滚动着在沙漠里高速移动。

en_desc.flavor_text:
It burrows and lives underground.
If threatened, it curls itself up into a
ball for protection.

zh_desc.flavor_text:
虽然锐利却有点儿脆弱的爪子
和刺经常会折断。因为第二天
就会长好，所以不必在意。

en_desc.flavor_text:
It is adept at attacking with the spines
on its back and its sharp claws while
quickly scurrying about.

zh_desc.flavor_text:
虽然它性格温顺不喜欢战斗，
但由于小犄角中含有毒液，
请一定要小心提防。

en_desc.flavor_text:
Though small, it must be treated with
caution because of its powerfully toxic
barbs. The female has smaller horns.

zh_desc.flavor_text:
待在巢穴深处的时候，
它一定会把身上的刺收起来。
这表明它正处于放松状态。

en_desc.flavor_text:
The female has a gentle temperament.
It emits ultrasonic cries that have the
power to befuddle foes.

zh_desc.flavor_text:
坚硬的鳞片覆盖着
强壮的身体。据说它的
鳞片会自己长出新的。

en_desc.flavor_text:
The body is covered by stiff, needle-
like scales. If it becomes excited,
the needles bristle outwards.

zh_desc.flavor_text:
一直竖起它的大耳朵
感知周围的情形。当它
察觉到危险便会使用毒针。

en_desc.flavor_text:
Its large ears are flapped like wings
when it is listening to distant sounds.
It extends toxic barbs when angered.

zh_desc.flavor_text:
头上的犄角里含有毒素，
当犄角撞穿了什么东西时，
毒素就会随着冲击而流出。

en_desc.flavor_text:
NIDORINO has a horn that is harder than
a diamond. If it senses a hostile
presence, all the barbs on its back bristle up at once, and it challenges
the foe with all its might.

zh_desc.flavor_text:
通过活用自己钢一般坚硬的
皮肤来使出强力的撞击。它的
犄角坚硬得能够刺穿钻石。

en_desc.flavor_text:
It is recognized by its rock-hard hide
and its extended horn. Be careful with
the horn as it contains venom.

zh_desc.flavor_text:
因为可爱的举止和样子，
不论男女老幼都很喜欢它。
但数量稀少。

en_desc.flavor_text:
Its adorable appearance makes it popular
as a pet. However, it is rare and
difficult to find.

zh_desc.flavor_text:
不喜欢在人面前现身。
喜欢群居在深山里静静地生活。

en_desc.flavor_text:
It has an acute sense of hearing. It can
easily hear a pin being dropped nearly
1,100 yards away.

zh_desc.flavor_text:
会操纵火球捕捉猎物。
如果从小就开始培育的话，
它就会像小狗宝可梦那样亲近人哦。

en_desc.flavor_text:
While young, it has six gorgeous tails.
When it grows, several new tails are
sprouted.

zh_desc.flavor_text:
至今还流传着９位圣者
合体变成九尾的传说，
是充满神秘色彩的宝可梦。

en_desc.flavor_text:
It has nine long tails and fur that 
gleams gold. It is said to live for 
1,000 years.

zh_desc.flavor_text:
把肚子鼓得大大的，
唱出神奇的旋律。
听到后就会马上昏昏欲睡。

en_desc.flavor_text:
It captivates foes with its huge, round
eyes, then lulls them to sleep by singing
a soothing melody.

zh_desc.flavor_text:
蓬松的毛发会随着季节转换
而掉落。收集这些毛发后
纺织成的毛线是高级商品。

en_desc.flavor_text:
Its fur is extremely fine, dense, and
supple. The exquisitely pleasant fur
conveys an image of luxury.

zh_desc.flavor_text:
白天在洞穴里睡觉。
因为没有眼睛，所以用超音波
一边探测周围，一边飞行。

en_desc.flavor_text:
ZUBAT avoids sunlight because exposure
causes it to become unhealthy.
During the daytime, it stays in caves or under the eaves of old houses, sleeping
while hanging upside down.

zh_desc.flavor_text:
粗粗的牙齿像吸管一样，
中间是空的，因而意想不到的脆弱。
是为了吸血而特别进化的。

en_desc.flavor_text:
It clamps down on its prey with needle-
sharp fangs and drains over 10 ounces of
blood in one gulp.

zh_desc.flavor_text:
要是以为它是普通的草而
将它拔起，就会听到它的叫声。
这让人感到莫名的恐怖。

en_desc.flavor_text:
Its scientific name is “Oddium Wanderus.”
At night, it is said to walk nearly 1,000
feet on its two roots.

zh_desc.flavor_text:
奇臭无比！即使如此，
一千个人里总会出现
一个人喜欢闻这种味道。

en_desc.flavor_text:
Its pistils exude an incredibly foul odor.
The horrid stench can cause fainting at a
distance of 1.25 miles.

zh_desc.flavor_text:
为了散布有毒的花粉
而摇动其巨大的花瓣，
同时发出震耳的响声。

en_desc.flavor_text:
VILEPLUME has the world’s largest
petals. They are used to attract prey
that are then doused with toxic spores. Once the prey are immobilized, this
POKéMON catches and devours them.

zh_desc.flavor_text:
即使不停地吃，
获取的营养也几乎都会被
背上生长的蘑菇夺走。

en_desc.flavor_text:
Growing out of the bug’s back are
mushrooms called tochukaso. The mushrooms
grow with the bug host.

zh_desc.flavor_text:
大大的蘑菇操纵着派拉斯特。
经常和灯罩夜菇争夺领地。

en_desc.flavor_text:
It scatters toxic spores from the
mushroom cap. In China, the spores are
used as herbal medicine.

zh_desc.flavor_text:
在明亮的地方你便能发现它
具有雷达功能的大眼其实是
由许多个小眼睛聚集而成的。

en_desc.flavor_text:
Its eyes act as radar, enabling it to be
active in darkness. The eyes can also
shoot powerful beams.

zh_desc.flavor_text:
如果不小心把它翅膀上的鳞粉
沾到了身上，那不但会很难去除，
更糟的是毒素也会从那里渗入。

en_desc.flavor_text:
VENOMOTH are nocturnal--they only are
active at night. Their favorite prey are
insects that gather around streetlights,
attracted by the light in the darkness.

zh_desc.flavor_text:
在地下啃食树根。
因有些品种的蔬菜会遭其啃食，
是可能对农户造成灾害的宝可梦。

en_desc.flavor_text:
DIGLETT are raised in most farms.
The reason is simple--wherever they
burrow, the soil is left perfectly tilled
for growing delicious crops.

zh_desc.flavor_text:
三胞胎合作行动。
甚至连地下１００公里都能挖到，
这种力量是团队合作的成果。

en_desc.flavor_text:
In battle, it digs through the ground and
strikes the unsuspecting foe from an
unexpected direction.

zh_desc.flavor_text:
白天就一直睡啊睡地度过，
太阳落山时才开始活动。
在夜晚的街道上搜寻硬币。

en_desc.flavor_text:
MEOWTH withdraw their sharp claws into
their paws to silently sneak about.
For some reason, this POKéMON loves
shiny coins that glitter with light.

zh_desc.flavor_text:
性情粗暴，只要视线对上就会
猛扑过来。被锐利的爪子抓到的话，
就会留下很深的伤口。

en_desc.flavor_text:
Has a vicious temperament. Beware if it
raises its tail straight up. It is a signal
that it is about to pounce and bite.

zh_desc.flavor_text:
不受自己控制，
时不时地会产生念力，
导致头痛流泪。

en_desc.flavor_text:
It is constantly wracked by a headache.
When the headache turns intense, it begins
using mysterious powers.

zh_desc.flavor_text:
据说戴着额头红色的部分
就会被赋予神通力，
过去也曾因此被人类过度捕捉。

en_desc.flavor_text:
A GOLDUCK is an adept swimmer.
It sometimes joins competitive swimmers
in training. It uses psychic powers when
its forehead shimmers with light.

zh_desc.flavor_text:
会没有任何征兆突然发怒。
如果大肆胡闹后谁都不在了的话，
又会因无法忍受孤独而再次发怒。

en_desc.flavor_text:
Light and agile on its feet, and ferocious
in temperament. When angered, it flies into
an uncontrollable frenzy.

zh_desc.flavor_text:
因为太过生气以致于就这么死去，
这种事也是有的。
但死的时候表情很安详。

en_desc.flavor_text:
It is always outrageously furious. If it
gives chase, it will tenaciously track the
target no matter how far.

zh_desc.flavor_text:
机灵而忠诚。但是对于
不认识的或是侵犯领地的，
会狂吠不停并作出威吓。

en_desc.flavor_text:
Very friendly and faithful to people.
It will try to repel enemies by barking
and biting.

zh_desc.flavor_text:
在东方的古代传说中也会出现。
充满威严，强壮而又美丽的宝可梦。

en_desc.flavor_text:
A POKéMON that is described in Chinese
legends. It is said to race at an
unbelievable speed.

zh_desc.flavor_text:
漩涡是透明可见的内脏。
当颜色带有白色时，
说明是生什么病了。

en_desc.flavor_text:
Its slick black skin is thin and damp.
A part of its internal organs can be seen
through the skin as a spiral pattern.

zh_desc.flavor_text:
即使在陆地上也能正常生活，
但因为天敌的宝可梦较少，
所以更喜欢在水中生活。

en_desc.flavor_text:
Its two legs are well developed.
Even though it can live on the ground,
it prefers living in water.

zh_desc.flavor_text:
阿罗拉的蚊香泳士擅长蛙泳。
模仿蚊香泳士学习游泳的孩子也很多。

en_desc.flavor_text:
An adept swimmer, it knows the front
crawl, butterfly, and more. It is faster
than the best human swimmers.

zh_desc.flavor_text:
１天中有１８个小时在睡觉。
即使睡着，也能用瞬间移动
在树上移动，采树果吃。

en_desc.flavor_text:
It sleeps for 18 hours a day. It uses a
variety of extrasensory powers even
while asleep.

zh_desc.flavor_text:
也有说是超能力少年
无法抑制自己体内的
精神力量，变身而成。

en_desc.flavor_text:
It is rumored that a boy with psychic
abilities suddenly transformed into
KADABRA while he was assisting research
into extrasensory powers.

zh_desc.flavor_text:
智商大约有５０００。
强大的念力满溢出来，
光是呆在旁边就会头痛不已。

en_desc.flavor_text:
It does not like physical attacks very 
much. Instead, it freely uses extra­
sensory powers to defeat foes.

zh_desc.flavor_text:
非常喜欢锻炼。
盯着自己每天不断增大的肌肉，
愈加勤奋地锻炼。

en_desc.flavor_text:
It continually undertakes strenuous
training to master all forms of martial
arts. Its strength lets it easily hoist
a sumo wrestler onto its shoulders.

zh_desc.flavor_text:
不断锻炼的结果就是
拥有了非常惊人的力量。
灵活运用这力量帮助人类工作。

en_desc.flavor_text:
Its formidable body never gets tired.
It helps people by doing work such as
the moving of heavy goods.

zh_desc.flavor_text:
使出百万吨级的拳击，
将阻挡的敌人击飞到
地平线的另一端。

en_desc.flavor_text:
Its four ruggedly developed arms can
launch a flurry of 1,000 punches in just
two seconds.

zh_desc.flavor_text:
喜欢温度高，有一定
湿度的地方。它会用
身上的藤蔓抓小虫来吃。

en_desc.flavor_text:
Its bud looks like a human face. Because
of the bud, it is rumored to be a type of
legendary mandrake plant.

zh_desc.flavor_text:
它在肚子饿的时候会
吞掉周围会动的东西，
分泌溶解液让其致命。

en_desc.flavor_text:
The leafy parts act as cutters for
slashing foes. It spits a fluid that
dissolves everything.

zh_desc.flavor_text:
用花蜜的香味引诱猎物。
据说被它吞入嘴里的东西，
只要1天就会溶解到连骨头都不剩。

en_desc.flavor_text:
VICTREEBEL has a long vine that
extends from its head. This vine is
waved and flicked about as if it were an animal to attract prey. When an
unsuspecting prey draws near, this
POKéMON swallows it whole.

zh_desc.flavor_text:
在沙滩等地方晒干后，
依然能存活的情况也有很多。
泡在水里的话就会湿润复活。

en_desc.flavor_text:
Its eyes are as transparent as crystals.
From them, it shoots mysterious
beams of light.

zh_desc.flavor_text:
有毒的触手通常是８０根。
活得越久，触手的数量就越会减少。

en_desc.flavor_text:
It has 80 tentacles that move about
freely. They can sting, causing poisoning
and sharp, stabbing pain.

zh_desc.flavor_text:
圆圆的很容易拿，
但要互相扔的话，又硬又重。
像打雪仗那样扔着玩会很危险。

en_desc.flavor_text:
Its round form makes it easy to pick up.
Some people have used them to hurl
at each other in a snowball fight.

zh_desc.flavor_text:
非常喜欢吃长有苔藓的岩石。
发着嘎吱嘎吱的声音，
１天吃１吨以上。

en_desc.flavor_text:
They descend from mountains by tumbling
down steep slopes. They are so brutal,
they smash aside obstructing trees and
massive boulders with thunderous tackles.

zh_desc.flavor_text:
即使用炸药爆破身体也毫发无伤，
但非常讨厌湿气和雨。

en_desc.flavor_text:
It is enclosed in a hard shell that is as
rugged as slabs of rock. It sheds skin
once a year to grow larger.

zh_desc.flavor_text:
在用力跳跃之后，会
用蹄子和脚上的肌肉
来缓解着地时的撞击。

en_desc.flavor_text:
Its body is light, and its legs are
incredibly powerful. It can clear
Ayers Rock in one leap.

zh_desc.flavor_text:
总之就是喜欢跑步。如果
发现有谁跑得比自己更快，
就会用尽全力去追赶。

en_desc.flavor_text:
It usually canters casually in the fields
and plains. But once a RAPIDASH turns
serious, its fiery manes flare and blaze
as it gallops its way up to 150 mph.

zh_desc.flavor_text:
长长的尾巴经常被揪断。
因为也不会觉得特别痛，
马上会长出来，所以并不在意。

en_desc.flavor_text:
SLOWPOKE uses its tail to catch prey by
dipping it in water at the side of a
river. However, this POKéMON often forgets
what it’s doing and often spends entire
days just loafing at water’s edge.

zh_desc.flavor_text:
呆呆地望着大海。
因大舌贝的毒在身体中循环
而变得越来越傻乎乎。

en_desc.flavor_text:
When a SLOWPOKE went hunting in the sea,
its tail was bitten by a SHELLDER. That
made it evolve into SLOWBRO.

zh_desc.flavor_text:
聚集在有电的地方。
也会密密麻麻地贴在
输送电力的铁塔等地方。

en_desc.flavor_text:
It moves while constantly hovering.
It discharges THUNDER WAVE and so on
from the units at its sides.

zh_desc.flavor_text:
连接的时候，３只小磁怪的
脑袋也会连成一体。
但并不会变得３倍聪明。

en_desc.flavor_text:
A linked cluster formed of several
MAGNEMITE. It discharges powerful
magnetic waves at high voltage.

zh_desc.flavor_text:
用植物的茎来战斗。
茎的挥舞方式存在着
好几种不同的流派。

en_desc.flavor_text:
It always walks about with a plant stalk
clamped in its beak. The stalk is used for
building its nest.

zh_desc.flavor_text:
羽毛较短所以不擅长飞行，
但是拥有发达的双脚，
能够以很快的速度奔跑。

en_desc.flavor_text:
A two-headed POKéMON that was discovered
as a sudden mutation. It runs at a pace
of over 60 miles per hour.

zh_desc.flavor_text:
由嘟嘟的某个头分裂
出的变种。以60千米的
时速在草原上奔跑。

en_desc.flavor_text:
A peculiar POKéMON species with three
heads. It vigorously races across grassy
plains even in arid seasons with little
rainfall.

zh_desc.flavor_text:
人们一直以为它只生活在寒冷的海域。
它出现在阿罗拉的原因是个谜。

en_desc.flavor_text:
Covered with light blue fur, its hide is
thick and tough. It is active in bitter
cold of minus 40 degrees Fahrenheit.

zh_desc.flavor_text:
能以８节的速度在海里游动，
并搜寻能当做猎物的宝可梦。
特别喜欢吃弱丁鱼。

en_desc.flavor_text:
Its body is covered with a pure white
fur. The colder the weather, the more
active it becomes.

zh_desc.flavor_text:
工厂排放的污泥废液
是其主要的饵料。
最近数量减少了。

en_desc.flavor_text:
Sludge exposed to X rays from the moon
transformed into GRIMER. It loves feeding
on filthy things.

zh_desc.flavor_text:
总之就是臭得鼻子都不敢呼吸。
但是也存在着部分觉得这味道
很不错的臭臭泥爱好者。

en_desc.flavor_text:
It is usually undetectable because it
blends in with the ground. Touching it can
cause terrible poisoning.

zh_desc.flavor_text:
壳的硬度超过钻石。
过去，人们会收集壳来做成盾牌。

en_desc.flavor_text:
It is encased in a shell that is harder
than diamond. Inside, however, it is
surprisingly tender.

zh_desc.flavor_text:
坚硬的外壳连燃烧弹也无法击碎。
壳中的正身至今不明。

en_desc.flavor_text:
Its shell is extremely hard. It cannot be
shattered, even with a bomb. The shell
opens only when it is attacking.

zh_desc.flavor_text:
如果在已成废墟的
建筑物里亮着怪异的光，
说明那里潜藏着鬼斯。

en_desc.flavor_text:
A being that exists as a thin gas. It can
topple an Indian elephant by enveloping
the prey in two seconds.

zh_desc.flavor_text:
从阴暗处袭击人类。
如果被其冰冷的舌头舔到，
就会一天天虚弱至死。

en_desc.flavor_text:
If you get the feeling of being watched
in darkness when nobody is around,
HAUNTER is there.

zh_desc.flavor_text:
如果突然被寒气侵袭，
那就是被耿鬼袭击的证据。
没有可逃之法，所以死心吧。

en_desc.flavor_text:
It is said to emerge from darkness to
steal the lives of those who become lost
in mountains.

zh_desc.flavor_text:
以惊人之势钻地觅食。在它
通过之后形成的洞穴会
被地鼠们当作自己的住处。

en_desc.flavor_text:
It usually lives underground. It searches
for food while boring its way through the
ground at 50 miles per hour.

zh_desc.flavor_text:
吞食梦来生存的宝可梦。
被认为与食梦梦和梦梦蚀
有着共同的祖先。

en_desc.flavor_text:
A descendent of the legendary animal
baku, which is said to eat dreams. It is
skilled at hypnotism.

zh_desc.flavor_text:
是非常危险的宝可梦，
但祈求良好睡眠的人们
称其为救世主。

en_desc.flavor_text:
It carries a pendulum-like device. There
once was an incident in which it took 
away a child it hypnotized.

zh_desc.flavor_text:
钳子是它强悍的武器，但在
攻击时钳子偶尔会脱落。
脱落后很快会长出新的来。

en_desc.flavor_text:
It can be found near the sea. The large
pincers grow back if they are torn out of
their sockets.

zh_desc.flavor_text:
一边的钳子很是巨大，
虽说硬如钢铁还拥有
１万马力，但还是太重了。

en_desc.flavor_text:
Its large and hard pincer has 10,000-
horsepower strength. However, being so
big, it is unwieldy to move.

zh_desc.flavor_text:
据说它与精灵球相似的外形
其实是它的保护色，但它
很容易自爆这一点也出人意料。

en_desc.flavor_text:
A life-form whose identity is unknown.
It is said to SCREECH or suddenly
SELFDESTRUCT.

zh_desc.flavor_text:
只要受到一点撞击，
就会由于体内的
电能溢出导致爆炸。

en_desc.flavor_text:
It explodes in response to even minor
stimuli. It is feared, with the nickname
of “The Bomb Ball.”

zh_desc.flavor_text:
用心灵感应与伙伴交流。
据说兼有植物与某种别的遗传基因。

en_desc.flavor_text:
Even though it appears to be eggs of
some sort, it was discovered to be a life-
form more like plant seeds.

zh_desc.flavor_text:
各个脑袋里有各自的思想，
通过心灵感应来交谈，
决定大家要做什么。

en_desc.flavor_text:
It is called “The Walking Tropical
Rainforest.” Each of the nuts has
a face and a will of its own.

zh_desc.flavor_text:
想起与自己天人永隔的母亲
而大声哭泣。被听到声音的
秃鹰娜从空中袭击。

en_desc.flavor_text:
It wears the skull of its dead mother on
its head. When it becomes lonesome, it is
said to cry loudly.

zh_desc.flavor_text:
将骨头像回力镖一样扔出去，
击落天敌秃鹰娜来复仇。

en_desc.flavor_text:
A MAROWAK is the evolved form of a CUBONE
that has grown tough by overcoming the
grief of losing its mother. Its tempered
and hardened spirit is not easily broken.

zh_desc.flavor_text:
在踢中敌人的瞬间，
脚底会变得像钻石般坚硬，
将对手踢成碎片。

en_desc.flavor_text:
The legs freely contract and stretch.
The stretchy legs allow it to hit a
distant foe with a rising kick.

zh_desc.flavor_text:
它的拳击好似钻头一般！
在它的攻击之下，哪怕是
水泥墙也会被钻出洞来。

en_desc.flavor_text:
The spirit of a pro boxer has infused this
POKéMON. It throws punches that are
faster than a bullet train.

zh_desc.flavor_text:
不管是什么，都会用长舌头去舔舔看。
被舔到的部位如果放着不管
就会红肿发炎。

en_desc.flavor_text:
Its tongue is twice the length of its
body. It can be moved like an arm for
grabbing food and attacking.

zh_desc.flavor_text:
在炎热的地方，它体内的
气体会由于膨胀而产生
爆炸的危险，需要注意。

en_desc.flavor_text:
Its thin, balloon-like body is inflated by
horribly toxic gases. It reeks when it is
nearby.

zh_desc.flavor_text:
它要靠吸收垃圾
里的毒气、细菌和
灰尘来维持生命。

en_desc.flavor_text:
Very rarely, a sudden mutation can result
in two small KOFFING twins becoming
conjoined as a WEEZING.

zh_desc.flavor_text:
单细胞的脑子只能思考
一件事情。一旦它开始猛撞，
直到睡着前都不会停止。

en_desc.flavor_text:
Strong, but not too bright, this POKéMON
can shatter even a skyscraper with its
charging TACKLES.

zh_desc.flavor_text:
可以只用后腿行走，智力也
发达了许多。像盔甲一样的
皮肤可以抵挡住岩浆。

en_desc.flavor_text:
It begins walking on its hind legs after
evolution. It can punch holes through
boulders with its horn.

zh_desc.flavor_text:
吉利蛋生下的蛋饱含丰富的营养。
是许多宝可梦非常爱吃的东西。

en_desc.flavor_text:
It lays several eggs a day. The eggs are
apparently rich in nutrients and extremely
delicious.

zh_desc.flavor_text:
全身被蓝色的蔓藤覆盖，
真面目不为人知。据说，
它的蔓藤会持续不断地生长。

en_desc.flavor_text:
Blue plant vines cloak the POKéMON’s
identity in a tangled mass. It entangles
anything that gets close.

zh_desc.flavor_text:
不能接近从袋里溜出来玩耍的孩子。
因为它的母亲就在某处守护着它。

en_desc.flavor_text:
The female raises its offspring in a pouch
on its belly. It is skilled at attacking
using COMET PUNCH.

zh_desc.flavor_text:
在感到危险时会从
嘴里用力地喷出水
或者特殊的墨汁。

en_desc.flavor_text:
It maintains balance using its tail, which
is wound up like a coil. It may spray ink
from its mouth.

zh_desc.flavor_text:
摸它的背鳍会导致麻痹。
为了避免在睡觉时被水冲走，
它会用尾巴缠住珊瑚。

en_desc.flavor_text:
Its body bristles with sharp spikes.
Carelessly trying to touch it could cause
fainting from the spikes.

zh_desc.flavor_text:
天气变得暖和之后，
就会成群结队溯流而上。
那画面正如告知春天的风景诗。

en_desc.flavor_text:
Its dorsal and pectoral fins are strongly
developed like muscles. It can swim at a
speed of five knots.

zh_desc.flavor_text:
凉飕飕的时候，全身就会
晕染成鲜红色。那样子正如
令人感觉到秋意的风景诗。

en_desc.flavor_text:
It punches holes in boulders on stream­
beds. This is a clever innovation that
prevents its eggs from being attacked or
washed away by the current.

zh_desc.flavor_text:
大多在海边栖息。
夜幕降临时，身体的正中
会闪耀出怪异的红色。

en_desc.flavor_text:
It gathers with others in the night and
makes its red core glow on and off with
the twinkling stars. It can regenerate
limbs if they are severed from its body.

zh_desc.flavor_text:
据说会从闪着光的内核
收发神秘的电波。
靠近的话可能会头痛。

en_desc.flavor_text:
This POKéMON has a geometric body.
Because of its body, the locals suspect
that it is an alien creature.

zh_desc.flavor_text:
有着非凡的默剧表演实力。
在你看入迷的时候，不知不觉间
就会出现一面真正的墙壁。

en_desc.flavor_text:
It is adept at conning people. It is said
to be able to create walls out of thin
air by miming.

zh_desc.flavor_text:
以忍者般敏捷的动作令猎物感到迷惑。
然后趁对方麻痹大意的一瞬间
用镰刀将其切碎。

en_desc.flavor_text:
Its blindingly fast speed adds to the
sharpness of its twin forearm scythes.
The scythes can slice through thick logs
in one wicked stroke.

zh_desc.flavor_text:
会按独特的节奏扭动腰部。
栖息在阿罗拉的迷唇姐，
那动作更是妙不可言。

en_desc.flavor_text:
It speaks using a language that sounds
human. Research is under way to determine
what is being said.

zh_desc.flavor_text:
突发的停电，有一半
是因为电击兽聚集在发电厂
胡乱吞食电力造成的。

en_desc.flavor_text:
It loves to feed on strong electricity.
It occasionally appears around large
power plants and so on.

zh_desc.flavor_text:
感到疲劳时就跳入火山口，
浸泡在熔岩中让身体解乏。
全身以１２００度燃烧着。

en_desc.flavor_text:
Found near the mouth of a volcano.
This fire-breather’s body temperature is
nearly 2,200 degrees Fahrenheit.

zh_desc.flavor_text:
用长长的角把对手夹住，
就这么把对方夹成两半。
非常强大，但很害怕寒冷。

en_desc.flavor_text:
Its two long pincer horns are powerful.
Once they grip an enemy, they won’t
release until the foe is torn.

zh_desc.flavor_text:
在世界各地都有骑着肯泰罗
生活的历史，但这一切的开端
据说是在阿罗拉。

en_desc.flavor_text:
When it is about to TACKLE, it whips
its body repeatedly with its three
long tails.

zh_desc.flavor_text:
力量很弱，派不上用场，
但就只有繁殖力惊人。
多得简直要看腻了。

en_desc.flavor_text:
It is virtually worthless in terms of both
power and speed. It is the most weak and
pathetic POKéMON in the world.

zh_desc.flavor_text:
据说，让暴鲤龙怒火中烧的
某个街镇在一晚上就被燃烧殆尽，
然后便消失无踪了。

en_desc.flavor_text:
Once GYARADOS goes on a rampage, its
ferociously violent blood doesn’t calm
until it has burned everything down. There are records of this POKéMON’s
rampages lasting a whole month.

zh_desc.flavor_text:
拥有很高的智商，理解人类的语言。
心情好的时候会用美妙的声音唱歌。

en_desc.flavor_text:
Its high intelligence enables it to
understand human speech. It likes to ferry
people on its back.

zh_desc.flavor_text:
通过重组细胞让自己样子变得
和眼前的对手一模一样。
相似度依个体而有所不同。

en_desc.flavor_text:
It can freely recombine its own cellular
structure to transform into other life-
forms.

zh_desc.flavor_text:
拥有不平衡性外加不稳定的
遗传基因，因而蕴含着各种
各样的进化可能性。

en_desc.flavor_text:
An extremely rare POKéMON that may
evolve in a number of different ways
depending on stimuli.

zh_desc.flavor_text:
细胞构造与水分子非常相似。
在水边栖息，所以有时候
会被错认为是人鱼。

en_desc.flavor_text:
Its body’s cellular structure is similar to
the molecular composition of water.
It can melt invisibly in water.

zh_desc.flavor_text:
喷出大约１００００伏特的电力。
因为相当神经质，所以要与它
变得亲密是非常困难的。

en_desc.flavor_text:
If it is angered or startled, the fur all
over its body bristles like sharp needles
that pierce foes.

zh_desc.flavor_text:
如果寻获树果或是捉到猎物，
就会喷出火焰将其烤至完全熟透，
之后大口大口吃掉。

en_desc.flavor_text:
It has a flame bag inside its body. After
inhaling deeply, it blows out flames of
nearly 3,100 degrees Fahrenheit.

zh_desc.flavor_text:
大约２０年前，
集当时的科学力量于一身，
创造出来的人工宝可梦。

en_desc.flavor_text:
It is capable of reverting itself entirely
back to program data in order to enter
cyberspace. A PORYGON is copy-
protected so it cannot be duplicated.

zh_desc.flavor_text:
生活在古代海洋中的宝可梦。
好像曾是始祖大鸟的食物，
发现过带有齿痕的化石。

en_desc.flavor_text:
A prehistoric POKéMON that lived in the
primordial sea, it swims by twisting its
10 tentacles about.

zh_desc.flavor_text:
被认为是由于身上沉重的壳
而灭绝的古代宝可梦。
好像是章鱼桶的远祖。

en_desc.flavor_text:
Its tentacles are highly developed as if
they are hands and feet. As soon as it
ensnares prey, it bites.

zh_desc.flavor_text:
３亿年前繁衍兴旺的宝可梦。
据说在某些地区，至今仍能
偶尔看见活着的化石盔。

en_desc.flavor_text:
This POKéMON was regenerated from the
fossil of an ancient creature. It protects
itself with a hard shell.

zh_desc.flavor_text:
为了在陆地上也能活动，
身体开始了演化，
但没等演化完，它就灭绝了。

en_desc.flavor_text:
KABUTOPS once swam underwater to hunt 
for prey. It was apparently evolving from
being a water dweller to living on land as
evident from changes in its gills and legs.

zh_desc.flavor_text:
恐龙时代的宝可梦。
用锯子一样的牙齿
将猎物撕碎后吞食。

en_desc.flavor_text:
AERODACTYL is a POKéMON from the age
of dinosaurs. It was regenerated from DNA
extracted from amber. It is imagined to
have been the king of the skies.

zh_desc.flavor_text:
据说拥有最强的胃袋。
就连臭臭泥的毒对卡比兽的
舌头来说也只是调味料而已。

en_desc.flavor_text:
It is not satisfied unless it eats over 880
pounds of food every day. When it is done
eating, it goes promptly to sleep.

zh_desc.flavor_text:
传说的鸟宝可梦。它能将
冬日空中的空气中含有的
水分冻结，降下雪花。

en_desc.flavor_text:
One of the legendary bird POKéMON.
With its long tail trailing behind, its
flying form is magnificent.

zh_desc.flavor_text:
当天空黑暗，落雷
不断时，这只传说的
宝可梦就会出现。

en_desc.flavor_text:
ZAPDOS is a legendary bird POKéMON that
has the ability to control electricity.
It usually lives in thunderclouds. It gains
power if it is stricken by lightning bolts.

zh_desc.flavor_text:
传说的鸟宝可梦。当它
挥舞起剧烈燃烧着的双翅，
哪怕是夜空也会被点亮。

en_desc.flavor_text:
One of the legendary bird POKéMON.
Those seeing it are overwhelmed by its
orange wings that seem to be on fire.

zh_desc.flavor_text:
通过反复蜕皮一点点长大。
将蜕下的皮鞣制后做成的
靴子是超高级商品。

en_desc.flavor_text:
Even the young can exceed 6.5 feet in
length. It grows larger by repeatedly
shedding skin.

zh_desc.flavor_text:
人们相信它能操纵天气，
所以在哈克龙栖息的湖里，
供品总是源源不断。

en_desc.flavor_text:
A DRAGONAIR stores an enormous amount of
energy inside its body. It is said to alter
the weather around it by loosing energy
from the crystals on its neck and tail.

zh_desc.flavor_text:
遇难得救的男人
被带去的那个孤岛，
是曾属于快龙的乐园。

en_desc.flavor_text:
It can fly in spite of its big and bulky
physique. It circles the globe in just
16 hours.

zh_desc.flavor_text:
超梦的基因几乎和梦幻
完全一样，但是大小和
性格却迥异得让人吃惊。

en_desc.flavor_text:
A POKéMON whose genetic code was
repeatedly recombined for research.
It turned vicious as a result.

zh_desc.flavor_text:
用显微镜可以看到
它身上极短极细
且密集的体毛。

en_desc.flavor_text:
A POKéMON of South America that was
thought to have been extinct. It is very
intelligent and learns any move.
